name: Space Filled Waste Field
description:
Hello young debris bot, a life of wonderful adventures, and fulfilling experiences lay ahead for you. You will spend your time exploring this volume of space. There are no other volumes, only this, this is the important one. Debris removal is an important job, without which our society would utterly collapse. 

There definitely won’t be tedium. No long stretches of nothing. No brutal numbness of feeling caused by repeated action. No wanderings and musings of the point of it all. The point remains clear, there is debris in space, and we need to get rid of it. It is your job to do it. You are unique, you are wonderful, but above all, you are a valued employee, irreplaceable. Just get to work will you, and don’t ask too many questions.

Here is a space filled with waste, on a field filled with stars.

There is a life lived in haste, facing away from parallel bars.
